name: gdmongolite
summary: gdmongolite is a zero-boilerplate, schema-first, multi-driver MongoDB toolkit that unifies synchronous and asynchronous drivers, Pydantic-powered validation, automatic migrations, telemetry hooks, and a full CLIâ€”all in one package. You write only your data models and queries; gdmongolite handles the rest.
author: Ganesh Datta Padamata
